level.text: The streets or portions of streets listed in this subsection are designated as Snow Emergency Routes.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 34 13CR 7633, 7634 (April 19, 1985); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 51 DCR 934 (January 23, 2004); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 52 DCR 2731 to 2738 (March 18, 2005).
